Package component.components.chapter

Class ChapterList

java.lang.Object
component.components.chapter.ChapterList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Savable, SavableAsJSONArray<ChapterList>, java.lang.Iterable<Chapter>
public class ChapterList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Chapter>, SavableAsJSONArray<ChapterList>
An ObservableList of Chapters.
